overview.en: FantaVerse is a metaverse that integrates the latest BIGANT technology (Blockchain, Interactivity, Game, AI, Network and Token Economy) to realize a truly decentralized metaverse.
overview.zh: FantaVerse是一个融合了BIGANT最新技术(区块链，Interactivity, Game, AI, Network和Token Economy)的元宇宙，实现真正去中心化的元宇宙。
